metadata.synopsis: Screen adaptation of James Clavell's best-selling novel about a group of English, American and Australian prisoners in a Singapore POW camp during World War II. When an American officer bribes the Japanese camp commanders to provide him with better living conditions, tension arises between him and his fellow prisoners.

reviews: A cynical look at what humanity will do to survive under extreme circumstances.
In this environment, a hustler like King is sure to thrive, just as any resourceful rat would
